Arsenic in groundwater

Contamination of groundwater by geologically sourced Arsenic in Bangladesh is one of the largest poisoning of a population in history.

Keep reading

Resurrection of a Depleted Coastal Aquifer

A numerical modeling (MODFLOW-GMS) study on groundwater management of a salinized Mediterranean coastal aquifer.

Keep reading

Preparation of Industry Specific Guidebooks on Wastes: Thermal Power and Waste Accumulator Recycling Plants

Determination of process specific wastes, estimation of waste generation factors (kg/MWh) and identification of proper management strategies.
